definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Usually songs that are good to dance have terrible words.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，可以用来伴舞的歌曲歌词都很差劲。

sentences.english: "Compares badly to the mob" is not an endorsement.
sentences.chinese: “比暴徒还要差劲”，这样是不会被认可的。

sentences.english: Oh, you make me sound so bad.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你这番话让人觉得我很差劲。

sentences.english: I asked her what she meant by mean.
sentences.chinese: 我问她，她所谓的差劲是什么意思。

sentences.english: Worst of all the Garou fight amongst themselves.
sentences.chinese: 最差劲的是狼人们内部纠葛不停。

sentences.english: What is the worst fashion statement you have seen to date? Sarosh Shaheen, OTTAWA
sentences.chinese: 你至今为止见过的最差劲的时尚概念是什么？

sentences.english: His early fiction writing was so poor that he could not find a/publisher.
sentences.chinese: 他早期的小说作品差劲到没有出版商愿意出版他的书。

sentences.english: She is interviewed on the radio but acquit herself rather badly.
sentences.chinese: 她受到电台采访，但表现得很差劲。

sentences.english: Do you have a bad manager?
sentences.chinese: 你有一个差劲的老板吗？

sentences.english: A bad translation of a good book is a crime.
sentences.chinese: 一本好书翻得差劲，可就罪过了。

sentences.english: I have to be the world’s worst gift selector.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，我是世界上挑选礼物最差劲的人。

sentences.english: But bad shows have succeeded on TV before.
sentences.chinese: 但在《莱诺》之前，很多差劲的节目也获得过成功。

sentences.english: Without a doubt, it is among the worst.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，它是最差劲之一。

sentences.english: On the contrary, Dr. Xue was a very weak collaborator.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，薛博士是一名很差劲合作者。

sentences.english: B:Yes,the waiters are so rude and they kept us waiting for too long.
sentences.chinese: 服务生的态度好差劲而且他们让我们等太久了。

sentences.english: But they are making that very bad decision.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们正在做出这个差劲的决定。

definition: not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
to be underwhelmed/to be less than impressed
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
(dialect) not that great/not up to much/nothing special
